titles: By the Quene. Where in the parliament begon and holden at Westminster the eyght day of Iune in the.xxviii. yere of the raigne of the noble king of famouse memory king Henry the eyght, father of our soueraigne lady the Quenes Maiestie, one acte and statute was then and there made, entituled, an acte limitting the pryses of wynes ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: In Powles Churchyarde, by Rycharde Iugge and Iohn Cawood: Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,
notes: A proclamation regulating the price of wine.
At foot of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regi√¶ Maiestatis.

keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Elizabeth, 1558-1603 --  Early works to 1800.
